cleaned_text: Inner Balance Mood Enhancing Mist SetRegular price £12.95 Enhance your wellbeing with our Mood Enhancing Mists. Each mist is blended with essential oils that are designed to provide an instant mood boost. Our trio of mists are designed to help you create the perfect wellbeing atmosphere throughout the day. Our Positive Energy Mist contains a blend of Bergamont, Lime and Ginseng for an extra energy boost in the morning. if you need some time to re-balancing mid afternoon our Balance Me mist with Palmarosa & Echinacea is the perfect leveller. For some peace and tranquillity in the evening, our Relax and Unwind Mist contains Lavender & Chamomile to help you totally relax and aid sleep. Delivery UK: If your order is £30 or more delivery is free. If you order is under £30 a delivery charge of £4.95 will be added. Standard UK Delivery 2-4 Working Days. Returns We hope that you love your Aroma Home product as much as we do, if for any reason you do need to return your item please contact our customer care team via email at [info@aromahome.com](mailto:info@aromahome.com) or call 0203 735 9500, between 9am - 5pm Monday to Friday, who will be happy to assist. Size - 3x 105ml Info/Ingredients - Positive ), Panax Citrus Contents - x1 Positive Energy Mist x1 Balance Me Mist x1 Relax & Unwind Mist
